column2:
name
  1. The god of creation in Kalash religion.

name
  1. The demon-like counterpart of Indra in Kalasha mythology. He appears on earth as a dog; the devalog throw stones at him (shooting stars).

name
  1. The mythical homeland of the Kalash people.

verb
  1. To give or cause to have children.

noun
  1. A fenced pen in a goat shed for the young goats and lambs.

verb
  1. To try or attempt to do something.

noun
  1. A story or fable
  2. The dry prickly leaf of the holly oak.

noun
  1. A key made of a long wire.
  2. wild celery

verb
  1. To make a key (usually a wire key, for opening wooden latches).

noun
  1. The valley of Achuaga, between Rumbur and Bumboret.

verb
  1. To dry up, especially from evaporation and age.
  2. To close up from old age.
  3. To sleep or hibernate.

adj
  1. crooked, bent.

noun
  1. A hook; among other things these are used to lift the griddle off the fire and hang it up. It is commonly made from a forked branch.

noun
  1. A ceremony celebrating birth. This is performed five or six days after a birth. After purifying the mother with water and juniper smoke, girls take burning branches from the fire and run to the temple of Jestak, make a bonfire and jump over the flames shouting, "a'chambi a." It is called tus'ul'ek in Bumburet. It is known by this name only in Rumbur.

noun
  1. The wedge which holds the ploughshare in place.

verb
  1. To make watery, water down.
  2. to bring too many things.

verb
  1. To blow up, cause to swell, inflate.

verb
  1. To file a case against someone in court.

verb
  1. To be hospitable to someone, to treat with respect.

verb
  1. To become accustomed to, used to, habitual.

verb
  1. To cause something, an act, to become habitual.

pron
  1. some (of a larger group), a few

adj
  1. some

adv
  1. some, a (little) bit

verb
  1. ???, possibly to have a rest day

noun
  1. Death, the time that one should die.
  2. The spirit of death.

noun
  1. The place where Kalasha women are relegated during menstruation and childbirth (because of 'impurity')

noun
  1. blind for hiding behind while hunting or fighting

noun
  1. mountain top, peak
  2. succession of peaks which make up a ridge

noun
  1. a seed
  2. kernel or pit of fruits like a peach or an almond

verb
  1. To do (used as a verbal compound maker).
  2. To say (used as a verbal compound maker).
  3. To make, build (used as a verbal compound maker).

noun
  1. lamb, male or female, aged six to twelve months.

noun
  1. a ram, male sheep (one and a half years old and older)

noun
  1. place where fairies and evil spirits live; a wild, forsaken place

noun
  1. foam, scum, bubbles on the surface of a liquid.

verb
  1. to sleep
  2. (euphemistic) to engage in sexual intercourse with

pron
  1. they, them (absent from speaker) (3rd-person plural personal pronoun)

verb
  1. (transitive) [he/she/it] means

intj
  1. (adverbial, conjunctive, prepositional, or adjectival) in other words, actually, namely, to wit, kind of, somewhat, id est, that is, meaning, you know
  2. (filler) er, so, uh, well

verb
  1. To walk for rain. When it does not stop raining, the women may get together and walk to Tsiam. They do this to stop the rain without serious intention of going to Tsiam (where this is they are not sure).

verb
  1. To take a walk to stop the excessive rain.

verb
  1. he/she is (3rd-person singular present-tense form of ásik, "to be")
  2. he/she has (present perfect auxiliary)

pron
  1. we (1st-person plural personal pronoun)
  2. you (plural) (2nd-person plural personal pronoun)

pron
  1. his/her/its (present but far from speaker) (3rd-person possessive pronoun)
  2. he/she/it (present but far from speaker) (3rd-person personal pronoun)

pron
  1. they (present, nearby) (3rd-person plural personal pronoun)
  2. them (present, nearby) (3rd-person plural personal pronoun)

pron
  1. they (present but far from speaker) (3rd-person plural personal pronoun)

noun
  1. the period of mourning following the death of one's close relative

verb
  1. (of a man) to copulate with, have sexual intercourse with

character
  1. A letter in the Kalasha Arabic Alphabet, which is a combination of Lām and Diacritic Tāh (لؕ), used to represent a velarized alveolar lateral approximant

verb
  1. To cause (someone) to be put to sleep
